Anies: Jakarta Itu Setara, tapi Bukan Tanpa Diatur
03 Nov 2019, 13:07 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menjelaskan soal pembagian zona berdagang untuk PKL saat car free day (CFD). Anies menegaskan, pada prinsipnya Jakarta itu setara, namun bukan berarti tanpa diatur.
"Nah, saya ingin sampaikan apresiasi terima kasih kepada PKL yang mereka mau mengikuti apa yang kita atur. Prinsipnya selalu kita sampaikan, Jakarta itu setara, kesempatannya diberikan, tapi bukan tanpa diatur," kata Anies di kawasan Bundaran HI, Jalan MH Thamrin, Jakarta Pusat, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Anies mengatakan, dengan adanya pengaturan ini, para PKL pun akhirnya bisa mendapatkan rezeki. Rezeki itu diperoleh dari orang-orang yang sedang berolahraga di kawasan CFD.
"Begitu diatur baik-baik, alhamdulillah, mereka pun dapat kesempatan mendapat rezeki dari begitu banyaknya orang di sisi lain yang berolahraga nyaman," tutur Anies.

Anies: Jakarta is Equivalent, but Not Unregulated
03 Nov 2019, 13:07 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan explained about the division of trading zones for street vendors when car free day (CFD). Anies stressed, in principle, Jakarta is equal, but that does not mean it is not regulated.
"Well, I want to express my gratitude to the street vendors that they want to follow what we set. We always convey the principle, Jakarta is equal, the opportunity is given, but not without regulation," said Anies in the HI Roundabout area, Jalan MH Thamrin, Jakarta Center, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Anies said, with this arrangement, the street vendors were finally able to get sustenance. Sustenance was obtained from people who were exercising in the CFD area.
"Once it is set up well, thank God, they also get the chance to get fortune from so many people on the other side who exercise comfortably," Anies said.
